title: Material witness order; defined
context: §835-1 Material witness order; defined. A material witness order is a court order: (1) Adjudging a person a material witness in a pending criminal action; and (2) Fixing bail to secure the person&rsquo;s future attendance thereat. [L 1971, c 214, pt of §1; HRS §718-1; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 2016, c 55, §49]
